articles.title: TikTok launches TikTok AI Alive, a new image-to-video tool
articles.description: TikTok is launching its first image-to-video AI feature called TikTok AI Alive.

articles.description: The biggest addition is beat editing, which will help creators sync their audio and visual elements much more efficiently.

articles.title: PayPal launches iPhone NFC payments in Germany after EU forced Apple to open up
